cab.content: From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 2nd July 1917. . (Received 3rd, 7.30 a.m.) . Secret. Mahsuds. I have just received Amir's reply to my letter of8th June (vide Foreign Secretary's letter of same date) in which 1 said.chastisement of Mahsuds could be deferred no longer, and invited his co-operation in preventing spread of disturbance. Reply which is couched inmost friendly terms concludes :-- [R.] " God willing I shall not spare my efforts'in this respect as far aslies within my power." , We have independent evidence from Mahsuds themselves that he hasbeen as good as his word.
